item.title: Margaret Atwood Takes Satirical Shot at Controversial Alberta School Book Ban
item.description: ‘The Handmaid’s Tale’ author published a short story taking aim at a provincial order to remove 200 books from Edmonton school library shelves, including Atwood’s classic novel turned into a popular H
